entry.title: MOMENTA - Impro Theater Festival International
entry.content: Top-class international guests with innovative ideas and skills in improvisation, inspiring workshops, a hand-picked festival ensemble, shows, brand new improv formats, virtuosity and happenings - all this stands for a festival of special moments: MOMENTA!
